about.title: About LightClip
about.text:
LightClip v1.5 Feature Overview

1. Clipboard Core
- Automatically saves clipboard history with configurable maximum items.
- Records text, images, URLs and file paths copied from the system.
- Lets you quickly re-copy any previous item from history.
- Pin important items so they are never overwritten.
- Image entries store a thumbnail path and can be previewed on the right.
- Both list and preview areas use 18px fonts with automatic line wrapping.
- File entries allow you to re-copy paths even after moving files.
- Keyword search and type filters: All / Text / Image / URL / File / Pinned.
- Clipboard preview and list items use word-wrap for long content.

2. Templates & Hotkeys
- Dedicated "Templates" tab for managing common replies and signatures.
- Add, edit and delete templates freely.
- Enlarged template editor dialog with auto-wrapping text area.
- A 3-line preview area (13px font) under the editor for quick review.
- "Copy" button in the editor to send template content directly to clipboard.
- Templates can be bound to hotkey index 1–9.
- Global hotkeys Ctrl+Shift+1..9 copy bound templates into the clipboard.
- Global "open LightClip" hotkey is configurable (default: ctrl+shift+c) and supports multi-key combos.

3. UI & Themes
- Default 18px font size for comfortable long-term use.
- 6 switchable themes:
  1) Dark mode.
  2) Dark reading mode (warm gray).
  3) Dark cyber blue-green style.
  4) Light mode.
  5) Light cream mode.
  6) Cool light mode.
- Themes can be switched at runtime without restarting.
- Settings form spacing adjusted to ~7px per row for better readability.

4. Languages & Icons
- UI available in Traditional Chinese.
- UI available in English.
- Light and dark icon sets based on the maple-leaf + bird clipboard logo.

5. Storage & Data
- Uses simple JSON files to store settings, history and templates.
- Automatically creates folders and default files on first run.
- Images are stored under data/images and referenced by path.
- Each history entry includes a local timestamp and ISO timestamp.

6. System Tray
- System tray icon support.
- Hide window to tray instead of closing the program.
- Tray menu offers "Show Window" and "Quit".

7. Docs & Support
- Top toolbar provides: User Guide, Changelog, Report Issue, Cloud Sync, Settings, About, Help.
- "User Guide" button reads docs/操作說明.txt and shows it in a scrollable dialog.
- "Changelog" button reads docs/更新日誌.txt and shows it in a scrollable dialog.
- "Report Issue" button opens Gmail in the browser with recipient set to trialscales0430@gmail.com.

8. Cloud Sync (local export)
- Clicking "Cloud Sync" generates:
  - export_history.json (clipboard history).
  - export_templates.json (templates).
  - export_settings.json (settings).
  - lightclip_sync.json (combined file).
- Place the project or the cloud folder inside any cloud-synced directory (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, etc.) to have it uploaded by that service.

9. Packaging
- Can be built into a single EXE with PyInstaller.
- build_exe.bat helper script for Windows.
- Inno Setup script (build_installer.iss) to create installers.

This is the full feature set of LightClip v1.5.
